subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: LeBron James, Dwayne Wade and Chris Bosh combined for 65 points, and the Heat coasted to another easy victory and a 2-0 lead in their first-round playoff series.
snippet: LeBron James, Dwayne Wade and Chris Bosh combined for 65 points, and the Heat coasted to another easy victory and a 2-0 lead in their first-round playoff series.
